channel.title: Steam.exe:(main exception): To run steam, you must first connect to the internet
channel.description: Okay, what the fuck is this shit.

item.title: Steam.exe:(main exception): To run steam, you must first connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I always get this message when I try to connect through my cell phone connection, no matter what app I used: PDAnet, FoxFi and “Wireless Tether for Root users”.

The reason I complain is because when I go to CS non-steam I can see the updated list of servers and can play on them just fine(apart from all the hackers). Only can’t sign in to Steam…

Read full topic

item.title: Steam.exe:(main exception): To run steam, you must first connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: _TTU_MikeC
item.description:
This what I always do: go to your Steam main directory (typically C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam) and look for the ClientRegistry.blob file. Delete this file and run Steam (it will have to re-update). Works every time for me.

Read full topic

item.source: Steam.exe:(main exception): To run steam, you must first connect to the internet

item.title: Steam.exe:(main exception): To run steam, you must first connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: Gweeeep
item.description:
considering this forum is the first result on a google search of “to run steam you must first connect to the internet” I thought I would post the fix that worked for me - even though it is an old thread.

I am using a Billion BiPac 7404VGOX and I had to change the firewall general policy here:

Configuration
-Firewall
-General Settings
-Policy (changed from Medium security level to Low security level)

Hope it helps someone else.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
acade365:

The problem I’ve been having is that I have to enter my login info every time I want to log in, it doesn’t remember my password, though I have clicked the ‘remember my password’ checkbox.

[COLOR=‘Red’]
NO 1 . :ninja: (MAKE YOUR OWN THREAD, DIFFERENT PROBLEM)

NO 2 . try clearing all info and re-entering it.

NO 3 . Freash reinstallation of steam (backup and move your files if you do) (EVERYTHING)

item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur

Also why don’t you have a firewall up. Isn’t that just asking for trouble?
